text: I've heard rumors of the iPhone 7 not
having a headphone jack and potentially
not having a home button which we've
seen on every iPhone period I think
that's actually pretty cool I've been a
big fan of smartphones with a big screen
to bezel ratio meaning thin bezels big
screen fill up the whole front and the
iPhone doesn't do that very well so
forced touch might enable us to have
just a huge display on the front not a
whole lot of bezel and use some sort of
pressure action to go home and I'm not
having a home a headphone jack seems
kind of silly and a bit unnecessary
I know Apple likes to make their phones
thinner but you don't have to go to that
thin I would like to see improvements
with the battery in the iPhone I don't
expect them to be drastic considering
the iPhone is always pretty thin but if
it could be a software improvement or a
hardware improvement inside like the
chip they use to make it more efficient
by all means make that battery last
longer and then stuff like forced touch
it's easy to forget about forced touch
now because you don't really use it that
often not every app supports it but I
think we'll see even more force touch
for things like using things inside apps
and accessing parts of apps from your
home screen more often than you do now
